attributes.additional_details: The government should not have the power to infringe on our bodily autonomy, it is evil, it is immoral and most importantly it is the first step towards the creation of a medical apartheid of which there would be no coming back.
attributes.background: The government and members of Parliament must make a public commitment against the imposition of mandatory vaccinations on the people of this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282
